title: Ashli Babbitt's family to receive $5 million in settlement with Trump administration: sources
summary: The DOJ agreed to pay January 6 insurrectionist Ashli Babbitt's family $5 million to settle their lawsuit, signaling to rightwing militia members that they too can become millionaires committing violent acts for the president
